creditline: Gift of Shared Ventures in celebration of the 100th anniversary of the Minneapolis Institute of Arts
description: two boxers in the ring, with dark-haired boxer at right seen from back with feet wide apart; balding boxer with dark chest hair at left, holding his PL arm in front of his chest and his PR gloved hand in front of his face; man wearing slacks, shirt and bowtie in middle ground visible between two boxers
title: Untitled (New York, Joe Louis, Detroit Brown Bomber, Tony Galento:  Galento-Louis Fight, June 28, 1939)
